ch.phonon.drawables

Class DrawablePicture

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.phonon.drawables.AbstractDrawable
      • ch.phonon.drawables.DrawablePicture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Positionable

    public class DrawablePicture
extends AbstractDrawable
    The DrawablePicture class provides a Drawable picture, that can be drawn like other Drawables. The pictures can be either directly provided as BufferedImages or loaded by providing a file name.
    Author:
    phonon

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ch.phonon.drawables.AbstractDrawable

        invariantScalingType

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DrawablePicture(StarPoint starpoint, LocalOrientation localOrientation, java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      This constructor constructs a DrawablePicture based on a centering StarPoint given in picture coordinates, a local orientation and a BufferedImage already loaded in memory.
      DrawablePicture(StarPoint starpoint, LocalOrientation localOrientation, java.lang.String pictureFileName)
      This constructor constructs a DrawablePicture based on a centering StarPoint given in picture coordinates, a local orientation and a file name.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DrawablePicture

        public DrawablePicture(StarPoint starpoint,
               LocalOrientation localOrientation,
               java.lang.String pictureFileName)
        This constructor constructs a DrawablePicture based on a centering StarPoint given in picture coordinates, a local orientation and a file name.
        Parameters:
        starpoint - center of the picture in picture coordinates
        localOrientation - local orientation (scale and rotation)
        pictureFileName - file name of the picture to be loaded

      • DrawablePicture

        public DrawablePicture(StarPoint starpoint,
               LocalOrientation localOrientation,
               java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        This constructor constructs a DrawablePicture based on a centering StarPoint given in picture coordinates, a local orientation and a BufferedImage already loaded in memory.
        Parameters:
        starpoint - center of the picture in picture coordinates
        localOrientation - local orientation (scale and rotation)
        image - BufferedImage to be used.

        Description copied from interface: Drawable
        Checks if the Drawable contains the coordinate (x,y) in the temView space
        Returns:
        is true, when it (x,y) is contained in Drawable of the active state (most of the time the state that is drawn into the view)
